Assises du NewSpace I 2026

8 July 2026 – 9 July 2026

Alliance NewSpace France, Centre National d’Études Spatiales (CNES), European Space Agency, GIFAS, ISAE-SUPAERO Paris, France

The Assises du NewSpace I 2026 is a major French and European space industry conference scheduled for July 8–9, 2026, in Paris, France. It is organized by a collective of key players in the French space ecosystem, including Alliance NewSpace France, CNES, ESA, Eutelsat, GIFAS, ISAE-SUPAERO, and several other leading aerospace and space innovation organizations.

Event Overview

The Assises du NewSpace I 2026 is an influential annual summit focusing on the NewSpace economy, bringing together entrepreneurs, industry leaders, researchers, government representatives, service providers involved in the rapidly evolving commercial space sector. Since its inception in 2022, it has become a pivotal platform for discussing space innovation, market trends, policy, and technological breakthroughs shaping the future of space activities in France and Europe.

Location and Venue

The 2026 edition will hold in Paris, at the Centre des Congrès de la Villette .This location situates the event at the heart of Europe’s largest scientific and innovation hub, facilitating high-level exchanges and networking.

Assises du NewSpace I 2026 Themes and Focus Areas

Exploration of the NewSpace ecosystem, including startups, industrial companies, and service firms.

Discussions on the future of the space economy, including market dynamics, investment opportunities, and commercialization strategies.

Policy and regulatory frameworks supporting space innovation and sustainable development.

Technological advancements in satellite manufacturing, launch services, space applications, and digital space technologies.

Strategic partnerships between public institutions, private sector, and academia to accelerate space sector growth.

Emphasis on the European and French space ambitions and how to position the region as a global leader in space innovation.

Assises du NewSpace I 2026 serves as a critical forum to unite the French and European space community, promoting innovation, investment, and strategic dialogue. It supports France’s ambition to strengthen its position in the global space economy and helps align stakeholders around common goals for sustainable and competitive space development.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
